CustomField.description: This field field is Created to Perform the Subsequent Rate Calculation only for Banded Z6 Price Structure to display the output rates in the CSV files created for SAP . For Banded Z6 subsequent Rate output rate would always be same as Calculated Base rate for less than 5kg and for >5kg it would be the existing subsequent being fed as part of the SAP Record creation . If Price Structure is not Banded Z6 it would return original Subsequent Rate being fed as part of SAP rate creation.
CustomField.label: Calculated Subsequent Rate
